title: Chandrika Kundan Haaram with Emerald Centerpiece
materials: Coral Drop. Features a Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram features intricate Kundan settings around a central emerald stone. The delicate floral and vine-inspired design showcases the art of Kundan craftsmanship. Accented with lustrous South Sea pearl drops and finished with a coral bead for a touch of tradition.
occasions: and other special occasions. A stunning choice for a modern bride or for important festivals such as Diwali and Sankranthi.
description: This haaram is a harmonious blend of traditional Kundan artistry and contemporary design. The high-quality Kundan stones provide exceptional brilliance, while the emerald centerpiece symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. The South Sea pearls add a touch of timeless elegance. A true statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
